meanings.definition: A small flowering plant with blue flowers.
meanings.sent1: I saw a pretty bluet in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The bluet added a pop of color to the field.
meanings.sent3: The bluet seemed to be waving at me in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like a bluet in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The bluet's delicate petals danced in the wind.

meanings.sent1: She painted her room in a calming bluet.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed different blues to create the perfect bluet.
meanings.sent3: The bluet sky stretched endlessly above us.
meanings.sent4: His mood matched the deep bluet of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The bluet of the ocean was mesmerizing in its beauty.

meanings.sent1: The cold made his lips bluet.
meanings.sent2: The fabric will bluet if you wash it with dark colors.
meanings.sent3: The potion unexpectedly caused the liquid to bluet.
meanings.sent4: The sky began to bluet as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: His skin started to bluet from the extreme cold.
